meanings.meaning: 1. spirit; mind; heart See also 気が大きい彼は年はとっているが気は若い。Though he is old, he has a youthful spirit.
2. nature; disposition See also 気が短い彼は親切というよりむしろ気がやさしい。He is more gentle than kind.
3. intention; mind; will; motivation See also やる気, See also 気がない, oft. after a verbもう待つ気が無くなった。I don't feel like waiting any longer.
4. mood; feelings See also 気が変わる, See also 気が重い人に褒められて悪い気はしない。No one feels displeased when he is praised.
5. consciousness See also 気を失う
6. care; attention; consideration; worry See also 気をつかう彼女は自分の容姿にとても気をつかっている。She cares a lot about her personal appearance.
7. interest See also 気を引く彼は気が多いやつだ。He's interested in many things.
8. (the) air; atmosphere
9. ambience; atmosphere (of); air (of); mood
10. fragrance; aroma; flavour; taste
11. qi (in traditional Chinese philosophy and medicine); chi; ki
12. Qi In traditional Chinese culture, qì (also chi or ch'i) is ... Read more
氣 【き】
氣: Out-dated kanji or kanji usage.

meanings.meaning: 1. whim; caprice; fancy 私たちがポルトガルへ行こうと決めたのはまったくの気まぐれだった。Our decision to go to Portugal was quite arbitrary.
2. capricious; fickle; whimsical; impulsive; changeable; temperamental 気まぐれな天気だな。The weather is fickle.
気紛れ 【きまぐれ】
